item.title: [Discord Bot] 02. Dice Rolling Bot
item.description:
Do you know about TTRPG? One of the most well-known is probably Dungeons & Dragons (D&D).
After watching hololive EN play, I thought, “Let’s create a dice rolling bot and give it a try.”

item.title: [Discord Bot] 01. Creating a Basic Bot
item.description:
Just for fun, let’s write something I haven’t written before.
Lately, I’ve been active on Discord, so I’ve decided to create a Discord ChatBot.
